Smart Battle Tankby Jangje

DESCRIPTION

Various pheripheral on Galaxy make the tank battle more exting and creative

June 23, 2016, 9:36 PM

Smart battle Tank
Description

Draft
Go top

DESCRIPTION

Welcome to Smart Battle tank world!!!

You can play more exciting and creative battle with Galaxy

Infra Red Cannon
Infra Red Cannon will destory your enemy
Shot detecting sensor and Life indicator display remained life
Infra Red cannon make the tank battle possible
Real Time Front View Streaming over WIFI
Galaxy Camera and WIFI makes you able to see the front area as first person narritive on real time
You and your friend can fight at the battle field where is out of your sight
Night LED Flash
LED flash extend your battle field to night time and the place where have no lingt
Sensor Extension
Various Sensor inside of Galaxy give you additional battle field information
Especially Magetic sensor give you the tank movement direction over wifi
IOIO inside of the tank afford extra pin which can be connected with other sensors
By adding aditional sensors, you can make your tank more intelligent in the
battle field

THINGS

Hardware component
· RC tank
· IOIO : For connectiong RC tank with Galaxy and extended Sensors
· OTG and USB cable
· 3D printed linker module for Combining Galaxy to RC tank
· Jumper Wires

INSTALLATION

HW Module Setting
1. Open the RC tank Tops : You need to remove the screw
2. Connect RC tank driver IC control pins to IOIO by using jumper cables
3. Right Foward/Backward, Left Forward/Backward
4. Cannon Left/Right
5. Cannon Shooting (IR Launching)
6. Shot sensing
7. Life indicating LED 1, 2, 3
8. Arrange IOIO and cables properly
9. Close the RC tank Tops
10. Make the linker module by using 3D Printer
SW Installation
1. Connecting Galaxy with PC
2. Download the SW image by clicking the install button
Combining Galaxy with RC tank
1. Combine the Galaxy with RC tank by using linker modue

DRAFT

HW Module Setting
